author: jtyberg
msg: Fix build script to run on all versions of Windows.
Invoke bbwp directly, rather than use cmd /c.
Works on Win XP and Win 7 x64.

author: jtyberg
msg: Change Camera plugin to use JS callback persistence.

author: jtyberg
msg: Add ability to persist JS callbacks.
Add NO_RESULT PluginResult status, for plugins that don't need to invoke a callback right away.

author: jtyberg
msg: Change build script to require code signing only for load-device target.

author: jtyberg
msg: Add sim.dir property to allow override of simulator directory.
Add sim.bin property to allow override of simulator device.
Add mds.dir property to allow override of MDS directory.
